pr_title: Fix send span to encapsulate multiple retries and use shared context

timeline.bodyText: Do we have a ClientConstants in SB to put this?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: This can live here for now if it is the only place it is used.
replies.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: If you execute Ctrl+N, then Constants, you'll find ServiceBusConstants.
replies.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: For the entityPath and hostName values, do we want to update the ServiceBusSenderAsyncClient or we should be able to retrieve it some other way?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: There is an entityName you can use for entityPath. I'm sure fullyqualifedDomainName is also exposed in this class.
replies.author: conniey

timeline.message: Fix send span multiple send attempts
update service name and add tests
update service name and add tests

timeline.author: conniey
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,17 +33,18 @@ public boolean isEnabled() {
      * new span will be added as a child, otherwise the span will be created and added to the context and any downstream
      * start calls will use the created span as the parent.
      *
+     * @param serviceBaseName the service name to be appended to the span name.
      * @param context Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
      * @param processKind the invoking process type.
      * @return An updated context object.
      */
-    public Context startSpan(Context context, ProcessKind processKind) {
+    public Context startSpan(String serviceBaseName, Context context, ProcessKind processKind) {
